sentences.en: At the aspect of material appearance, it gives priority to Ming, Qing and lately bequeath.
sentences.cn: 在物质形态方面, 以明 、 清、近现代遗留为主的遗留作为主体.

sentences.en: But we may also bequeath something light and beautiful, like a snail's shell.
sentences.cn: 但与此同时,我们也留下了一些如同蜗牛壳那般明快美丽, 色彩斑斓的东西.

sentences.en: He bequeathed all his silver to his children.
sentences.cn: 他把所有的银币都留给了他的孩子们。

sentences.en: I bequeath him this property to have and to hold.
sentences.cn: 我将此项财产遗赠给他,归他永久享有.

sentences.en: I bequeath myself to the dirt to grow from the grass I love.
sentences.cn: 我将我自己赠与尘土以便从我热爱的青草中生长.

sentences.en: If you want my family so badly , I hereby bequeath them to you.
sentences.cn: 我会双手奉上的,如果你想要我的家人的话.

sentences.en: It was to Warsaw that, at the end of his life , he bequeath his heart.
sentences.cn: 他临终时要求将自己的心脏送回华沙.

sentences.en: It will be better to bequeath it to him after my death, in my will.
sentences.cn: 我不如写在遗嘱里,等我死了留赠给他.

sentences.en: Knowledge: Compensation costs should bequeath Housing Units may be owned?
sentences.cn: 知识: 遗赠房屋拆迁补偿费用应归谁所有?

sentences.en: Most people bequeath their property to their spouses and children.
sentences.cn: 大多数人把他们的财产遗留给他们的配偶和孩子们.

sentences.en: She said if the world did not act conclusively now, it would only bequeath the problem to future generations.
sentences.cn: 她说如果人类现在不采取决定性的行动，那就只会把问题留给子孙后代。

sentences.en: To him I bequeath my collar and leash and my overcoat and raincoat.
sentences.cn: 我把我的颈圈、皮带、外套和雨衣遗留给它.

sentences.en: What worry me are the problems that we will bequeath to our children.
sentences.cn: 我所担心的是我们将遗留给我们的孩子的问题.

words.tran_cn: 遗赠；把…遗赠给；把…传下去

trans.tran_cn: 遗赠；把…遗赠给；把…传下去
trans.tran_en: to officially arrange for someone to have something that you own after your death

trans.tran_cn: 将（财物等）遗赠给，将（知识等）传给（后人）
trans.tran_en: to officially arrange for someone to have something that you own after your death
